31 class XQILLA_API Numeric : public AnyAtomicType
32 {
33 public:
34  typedef RefCountPointer<const Numeric> Ptr;
35 
36  /* is this type numeric? Return true */
37  virtual bool isNumericValue() const { return true; };
38
